I was kinda hoping Zardus could have the Vok turn Stallex into a 
Transmetal.  O well in memory of him I'll do my best not to mode any 
more.  Just can we PLEASE say Stallex, Mustex, and Rhesus exist.  And 
also I would like to propose upon the completion of this RPG we talk 
to Fox or someone and see if they'll make it into a cartoon.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: I'll miss you Yan. You were one of the biggest TransFans I ever
> talked too. I hope you can return soon. Remember, we are supposed to
> keep NBW going for at least another 20 years, LOL.(Inside joke, 
guys) I
> will gladly take Prowl, and will lead the Maximals with him. I'll 
leave
> your Pred Pack guys to Airly. C'ya buddy!
